name: Metaplex
description: Metaplex (MPLX) is the standard for launching tokens and NFTs on Solana. Used to create 99% of tokens and NFTs on Solana, Metaplex powers the networkâ€™s biggest stablecoins, RWAs, DEXs, launchpads, wallets, DePIN networks, DeFi apps and games, with more than 900 million assets created and over $10 billion in transaction value. 50% of Metaplex protocol revenue is used to buy back MPLX for the Metaplex DAO.
